授業目的: See English column
到達目標: See English column
特記事項: 2023 年度まで開講の「Skills-based English(IELTS)」との重複履修は不可。
授業方法: This course will be conducted face-to-face.   This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered individual, pair, and group work. Students are expected to actively involving contribute to the class, as well as complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

第1回:
All 14 lessons are conducted face to face.
Week 1: Introductions and course overview
60-120 minutes
第2回: Week 2: Reading Module Introduction
60-120 minutes
第3回: Week 3: Reading skills practice
60-120 minutes
第4回: Week 4: Reading skills practice
60-120 minutes
第5回: Week 5: Reading skills practice
60-120 minutes
第6回: Week 6: Writing Module Introduction
60-120 minutes
第7回: Week 7: Writing skills practice
60-120 minutes
第8回: Week 8: Writing skills practice
60-120 minutes
第9回: Week 9: Writing skills practice
60-120 minutes
第10回: Week 10: Reading or Writing skills as needed
60-120 minutes
第11回: Week 11: Reading or Writing skills as needed
60-120 minutes
第12回: Week 12: Reading or Writing skills as needed
60-120 minutes
第13回: Week 13: Test preparation, review
60-120 minutes
第14回: Week 14: Final Test
None
トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly above schedule is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students.
トピック.授業外学習2: Review each lesson and complete the regular homework assignments in order to be prepared for the following class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 30% participation and completion of assignments; 40% skills assessment; 30% Final test
評価.備考Note0: How much of the syllabus attempted is will depend on the pace, level, and needs of the individual students in the particular class.
